channel.title: 3mpwr App - Curated Disability News
channel.description: Daily curated news on disability rights, accessibility, and benefits across Canada

item.title: Renowned exoplanet researcher Sara Seager is bringing her quest to find another Earth back home to Canada
item.description: Canadian astronomical research is getting a big boost with the return of Sara Seager to Canada after around 20 years at MIT. Her research includes looking for life in the clouds of Venus and searching for Earth 2.0.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Severe solar storm could trigger auroras across Canada and northern U.S. states
item.description: Skygazers are spotting the lights deeper into Canada, the U.S. and Europe because the sun is going through a major facelift. Every 11 years, its poles swap places, causing magnetic twists and tangles along the way.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: These WW I amputees hiked from Alberta to Ontario on crutches a century ago
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Lethbridge gathers to remember Canada's fallen soldiers
item.description: Two well-attended Remembrance Day ceremonies in Lethbridge, Alta., drew hundreds of residents to honour Canada's fallen soldiers.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Durham regional police's 'poisoned' workplace highlighted in Ontario Civilian Police Commission report
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Veterans thrilled with Remembrance Day turnout in Calgary: ‘It wasn't for nothing'
item.description: 'Today is my most important day of the year. It's honouring those who have gone before us and those who are following,' said Iraq and Afghanistan veteran Rick Ostashower.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba Government's Mineral Development Fund Supports Future Mining Opportunities
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Alberta animal rescues forced to freeze intakes: ‘Like giving a death sentence'
item.description: For animals rescues across Alberta, with winter fast approaching, the situation is dire. Demand is through the roof, donations are low and volunteers are scarce.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Saskatoon gathers for city's 94th anniversary of Remembrance Day services
item.description: 2025's Remembrance Day ceremony at the SaskTel Centre drew in quite a large crowd. With thousands in attendance, people came to show appreciation to veterans and fallen soldiers.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Letter written days before end of WWII sheds light on Canadian soldier in Germany
item.description: The letter, written by Tom a few days before the end of the war, says, 'This morning's edition of the news says Hitler is dead and that his successor will fight until the last.'
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba Government Completed 23 Summer Infrastructure Projects
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: ‘It's about all of us': Armed Forces, veterans gather for Remembrance Day in Montreal
item.description: Under heavy snowfall, dignitaries including mayor-elect Soraya Martinez Ferrada and member of Parliament Marc Miller, who is a former infantry commander.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: ‘Everybody's gone': Canadians mark Remembrance Day as number of veterans dwindle
item.description: 'Events of the Second World War are very rapidly moving from the realm of lived history of people you can talk to … into history where you can't talk to the people who remember.'
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Water From Your Eyes bring chaotic brilliance to the Biltmore Cabaret
item.description: Get the best of Vancouver in your inbox, every Tuesday and Thursday. Sign up for our free newsletter.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Cariboo residents rally for missing mother of 3, Jennifer Provencal
item.description: Jennifer Provencal, a mother of three sons, has lived in the small unincorporated community of Forest Grove, just off Highway 97 near 100 Mile House, for almost two decades.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Roughrider, Alouette superfans prep for Grey Cup
item.description: Lance Hackewich loves his Saskatchewan Roughriders -- and he's got a 75-year-old desiccated, positively inedible piece of history to prove it.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Shaping Saskatchewan: Ernie Walker
item.description: Wanuskewin Heritage Park is working towards a UNESCO World Heritage designation. Ernie Walker, the chief archaeologist and co-founder of the park, is leading the push.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator
